Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to age and service eligibility requirements for ordinary retirement for members of the unified court system
Summary: Relates to age and service eligibility requirements for ordinary retirement for members of the unified court system; restores 55/30 for all members; reduces the retirement age from 63 to 62.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to eligibility for retirement benefits for certain members of the unified court system
